title: ProjectBridge Analysis Output v1.0
description: The contract between the ProjectBridge engine and all consumers (CLI, UI, export).

schema_version.description: Schema version for forward compatibility between engine and UI.

strengths.description: Skills detected in both the developer context and job requirements.

estimated_scope.description: Relative effort indicator for the recommended project.
